duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and amend insurance language in contracts for consistency with industry standards and business needs.
Analyze underwriting submissions for various insurance programs.
Collaborate with stakeholders for construction projects and identify risk for key exposures.
Support construction insurance claims process and ensure favorable settlement of claims.
Consistently apply risk management procedures and provide insurance guidance to business groups.
Demonstrate strong interpersonal skills and exercise independent judgment in critical matters.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a business-related discipline (Insurance and Risk Management preferred)
